ygData.subject: avoiding guards :)
ygData.msgSnippet: for starters, as a human sk i start off with a few less guard factions that want me dead than most other sk. that said, i freely admit that i spend virtually
ygData.messageBody:
for starters, as a human sk i start off with a few less guard factions
that want me dead than most other sk. that said, i freely admit that i
spend virtually all my time on antonica (where there are at least SOME
guards that dont kill me on sight) and i do often make wall-hugging runs
:) tho usually the wall hugging is to avoid an unfortunate encounter
with a griffin or giant rather than a guard; i could kill one (possibly,
and then only veeeerrrryyy slowly) but i'd rather avoid them altogether
unless i am hunting them on purpose. right now, the only cities i can
safely enter for sure are freeport, qeynos, and neriak, and there are
now places in qeynos where i am toast if i go past (a few too many
bloodsaber quests..) i MAY or MAY NOT be kos in kaladim now; i havent
checked recently, altho with all the gobbies i've killed i would not be
surprised if i was tolerated in butcherblock. i am also safely dubious
to the guards of rivervale because of those same goblins; HOWEVER the
halfling cleric near the kithicor zone is still quite KoS and i can't
raise fac with her; so if i want to pass thru rivervale, i have to go
invis. any sk can eventually be safe in highpass by killing enough
gnolls and shralok orcs; humans start out as dubious there, evil races
default as KoS tho. just start whacking away at the critters in the pass
until the guards dont attack you any more :) i've found a quest in
freeport (an easy one) that raises most factions in erudin, but the big
problem here is that it also LOWERS fac with erudite necros. which would
be our only reason for wanting to go past erudin, anyway :) still not
sure whether or not i'm safe in erudin as a human sk of innoruuk, i have
yet to check. lastly, i am kos in both grobb and oggok, by virtue of my
humanity ;( i'm hoping that i will soon be able to fix that for at least
one of those cities, but it will take some luck, and use of one specific
nodrop item which i do not yet posess.. hehe.

hope that helps some

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
